p: In the Hengchun Peninsula, the southernmost part of Taiwan Island, the coastline is constituted by uplifted coral reef remnants. The study site was located along the Frog Rock Trail (21°56ʹN, 120°48ʹE; altitude, 2–10 m) in Kenting National Park ( Fig 1). The research permit was issued by Mr. Qing Lin, director of the Kenting National Park in 2009.
